passages.text:
Get to the end of the map to claim victory!

[[Play-> First encounter]]
passages.name: New Game

passages.text:
Your first enemy, a penguin with a menacing look on his face, is barreling towards you with great speed, how do you fight it?

[[Go Over->Jump]]
[[Double Down->Go Faster]]
passages.name: First encounter

passages.text:
You've made it past the first foe! Above you is a set of blocks, choose wisely... 


[[Left-> ?]]
[[Right-> ??]]
[[Center-> ???]]
passages.name: Jump

passages.text:
The Penguin won, try something else and restart.

[[Go Back->New Game]]
passages.name: Go Faster

passages.text:
A Coin! With this you can do nothing! With your new found wisdom of currencey, you look to battle more foes. And one approaches from the top of a small hill, what will you do?

[[Wait and jump-> Wait]] 
[[Go for it-> It]]

A Coin! With this you can do nothing! With your new found wisdom of currencey, you look to battle more foes. And one approaches from the top of a small hill, what will you do?

[[Wait and jump-> Wait]] 
[[Go for it-> It]]

A powerup! Out of the block comes an orb. With it being collected, you can feel your body grow stronger and more powerful, you look for your next chance to break in your newly acquired abilites, only you dont know exactly what they hold for you...
And one approaches from the top of a small hill, what will you do?


[[Wait and jump->Patience]] 
[[Go for it-> Haste]]

*Bloop* you evade the Penguin's attack, climb the hill and see what is in store for you next...

[[Climb->Hill]]
passages.name: Wait

passages.text:
Didn't you know the high ground always wins? Anyways restart and try again, maybe you'll find something else in the block this time...

[[Restart->New Game]]
passages.name: It

passages.text:
On the other side of the hill you can see another set of blocks, hopefully you can get lucky this time...

[[First-> $]] 
[[Second-> $$]] 
[[Third-> $$$]]
passages.name: Hill

passages.text:
The Penguin comes for you, and as you jump to evade it, you feel that you go through it with ease, almost as if you weren't the one who finished it
You make your way up the hill and look out to find three more blocks, maybe you will find luck again...

[[First-> $]]
[[Second-> $$]]
[[Third-> $$$]]
passages.name: Patience

passages.text:
You run right up the hill and take the Penguin head on, breazing right through him. The power up you picked up must have been invincibiity. However, it begins to wear off as you reach the top of the hill. 
On the other side of the hill you can see another set of blocks, hopefully you can get lucky again...

[[First-> $]]
[[Second-> $$]]
[[Third-> $$$]]
passages.name: Haste

passages.text:
You hit the block and collect your coin, again. You can see the finish, so close. However it is guarded by a set of three Penguins, what is your plan of attack?

[[Go Over-> Go over]]
[[Go Through-> Through]]

A Powerup!! This one seems to have no effect... You take towards the Penguins with two options, go over them or straight through...

[[Over Them-> Over Them]]
[[Straight Through-> Straight Through]]

You hit the block and collect your coin, again. You can see the finish, so close. However it is guarded by a set of three Penguins, what is your plan of attack?

[[Go Over-> Go over]]
[[Go Through-> Through]]

You use a set of blocks to jump over the penguins below, you're free you've excaped them. You think of the glory you'll have with all the gold you've collected on your way. Amidst your day dream, you find yourself falling, right on top of a penguin. Time to start again.

[[Restart->New Game]]
passages.name: Go over

passages.text:
You run at the three birds with full speed, and right before impact jump and clear the other two with a forward somersault.

[[End Game->!!!]]
passages.name: Through

passages.text:
You look to evade the Penguins completly, by using a set of blocks to go over and finish. As you feel the sense of freedom, it begins to mix with a sense of fear. You are falling towards the penguins with great velocity, Just before they finish you off however, you jump again and land past the set of three, ready to claim victory.

[[End Game->!!!]]
passages.name: Over Them

passages.text:
You head right towards the Penguins, and before the first one. Gliding over the second but coming down towards the third, as you feel the iminent sense of death awaiting, you jump again and land clear of the three penguins with the goal in your sights.

[[End Game->!!!]]
passages.name: Straight Through

passages.text:
CONGRATULATIONS!!! You've completed the game, would you like to try again?

[[Retry->New Game]]
